Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • wolf.sheep.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Game
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable
    class that sets up the game in its mode - sheep or wolf
    Author:
    anitageorge and tanveenkaur
    See Also:
